full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 753 Filed 08/10/22 Page 26 of 264 1452 LC7VMAX1 Meder - direct witness. Q. Do you recognize this? A. Yes. Q. What is it? A. It's a photo from a CD I reviewed from the Epstein and Maxwell investigation. Q. Under what 1B number was that CD logged? A. 1B75. Q. Who's in this photograph? A. Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein. MS. COMEY: Your Honor, the government offers this in evidence. THE COURT: GX-325 is admitted. You may publish. (Government's Exhibit 325 received in evidence) MS. COMEY: Thank you, your Honor. Q. Who is on the left and who is on the right? A. On the left, Ghislaine Maxwell; on the right, Jeffrey Epstein. MS. COMEY: Ms. Drescher, we can now pull up what's been marked for identification as Government Exhibit 333, please, for the parties, the Court, and the witness. Q. Do you recognize this? A. Yes. Q. What is it? A. It's a photo from a CD I reviewed from the Epstein and SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018624
